channel.title: Im writing my first script and need help
channel.description: i know neopets is stupid (sorry if i offended someone, its my opinion) but it seems like a good site to start writing scars, so im trying to write a dice-a-roo sript for my first script. i have been looking at tuts and stuff but i can't figure out how to convert the dice into a bitmap so i can find it. when playing dice-a-roo the roll buttons change coordinates so i cant just put in click commands i need it to find bitmaps and then go from there. plz someone help me :)tips on what else to do plz post ty!

item.title: Im writing my first script and need help
item.dc:creator: @junkj junkj
item.description:
@junkj wrote:

theres a tut on bitmaps.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,10977.0.html

Read full topic
item.source: Im writing my first script and need help
